actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the tax treatment of moving expenses.

summary.text: Excludes from the gross income of a taxpayer any amounts paid by his employer to cover moving expenses which would be deductible by the taxpayer under the Internal Revenue Code provided the taxpayer accounts to his employer with supporting documentation showing the items for which the taxpayer received reimbursement or other expense allowance were actually incurred. Reduces to 10 miles the restrictions on eligibility for moving deductions and provides for the repeal of the dollar limitations on the amount of deduction permitted for moving expenses. Disallows deductions of moving expenses with respect to reimbursements not included in gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the tax treatment of moving expenses.
